ChangeList.Description: Added the **localAdmins** property to the [azureADJoinPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADJoinPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [localAdminSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/localAdminSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [allDeviceRegistrationMembership](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/allDeviceRegistrationMembership?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.

Removed the `allowedGroups` property from the [azureADJoinPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADJoinPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. For more information about this change, see the announcement [Important: Update to deviceRegistrationPolicy resource type](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-entra-azure-ad-blog/important-update-to-deviceregistrationpolicy-resource-type-for/ba-p/3912000).
Added the `allowedToJoin` property to the [azureADJoinPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADJoinPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the `allowedUsers` property from the [azureADJoinPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADJoinPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. For more information about this change, see the announcement [Important: Update to deviceRegistrationPolicy resource type](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-entra-azure-ad-blog/important-update-to-deviceregistrationpolicy-resource-type-for/ba-p/3912000).

Removed the `appliesTo` property from the [azureADJoinPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADJoinPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. For more information about this change, see the announcement [Important: Update to deviceRegistrationPolicy resource type](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-entra-azure-ad-blog/important-update-to-deviceregistrationpolicy-resource-type-for/ba-p/3912000).

Removed the `allowedGroups` property from the [azureADRegistrationPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADRegistrationPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. For more information about this change, see the announcement [Important: Update to deviceRegistrationPolicy resource type](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-entra-azure-ad-blog/important-update-to-deviceregistrationpolicy-resource-type-for/ba-p/3912000).
Added the `allowedToRegister` property to the [azureADRegistrationPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADRegistrationPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the `allowedUsers` property from the [azureADRegistrationPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADRegistrationPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. For more information about this change, see the announcement [Important: Update to deviceRegistrationPolicy resource type](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-entra-azure-ad-blog/important-update-to-deviceregistrationpolicy-resource-type-for/ba-p/3912000).

Removed the `appliesTo` property from the [azureADRegistrationPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADRegistrationPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. For more information about this change, see the announcement [Important: Update to deviceRegistrationPolicy resource type](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-entra-azure-ad-blog/important-update-to-deviceregistrationpolicy-resource-type-for/ba-p/3912000).
Added the [deviceRegistrationMembership](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/deviceRegistrationMembership?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [enumeratedDeviceRegistrationMembership](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/enumeratedDeviceRegistrationMembership?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [noDeviceRegistrationMembership](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/noDeviceRegistrationMembership?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [localAdminPasswordSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/localAdminPasswordSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the `localAdminPassword` property to the [deviceRegistrationPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/deviceRegistrationPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [azureADRegistrationPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureADRegistrationPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [azureAdJoinPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azureAdJoinPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [deviceRegistrationPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/deviceRegistrationPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the **deviceRegistrationPolicy** navigation property to the [policyRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/policyroot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **multiFactorAuthConfiguration** enumeration type.
Added the **policyScope** enumeration type.
